name: diamond-governance
description: A bridge between the Aragon framework and ERC-2535 facets

scripts.test: npm run generate-sdk && npx hardhat test --typecheck
scripts.deploy: npm run generate-abis && npx hardhat run scripts/Deploy.ts --network mumbai
scripts.generate-sdk: npm run generate-abis && npx hardhat run scripts/GenerateSDK.ts
scripts.generate-abis: npm run compile && npx hardhat run scripts/GenerateAbis.ts

author: Utrecht University - SecureSECO DAO
